languages.text: "Согласно катехизису эксплуатации и обслуживания, мои техносоратники должны были запереть врата монастыря от мирян и активировать ловушки. Участие посвященного магоса в данном мероприятии признаю оптимальным".

"According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."
languages.original_text: "Согласно катехизису эксплуатации и обслуживания, мои техносоратники должны были запереть врата монастыря от мирян и активировать ловушки. Участие посвященного магоса в данном мероприятии признаю оптимальным".

traits.locale_text: "According to the Catechism of Operation and Maintenance, my tech-brethren were supposed to lock the monastery gates from the laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained magos should be involved in effecting these countermeasures."

"According to the Catechism of Operation and Maintenance, my tech-brethren were supposed to lock the monastery gates from the laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained magos should be involved in effecting these countermeasures."

"According to the Catechism of Operation and Maintenance, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates from the laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should be involved in effecting these countermeasures."

"According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

languages.text: "Laut des Katechismus von Wartung und Betrieb sollten meine Techkameraden die Klostertore allen Laien verschließen und die Fallen aktivieren. Ich halte es für optimal, dass ein geweihter Magos seine Unterstützung bereitstellt."
languages.original_text: "According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

traits.locale_text: "Laut Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung sollten meine Techkameraden die Klostertore für die Laien verschließen und die Fallen aktivieren. Ich halte es für optimal, dass ein geweihter Magos an der Implementierung dieser Gegenmaßnahmen beteiligt ist."

languages.text: « D'après le Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance, mes technoconfrères étaient censés interdire l'accès du monastère aux profanes et activer les pièges. Il me paraît préférable qu'un magos ordonné vous apporte son aide. »
languages.original_text: "According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

traits.locale_text: « D'après le Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance, mes technoconfrères étaient censés interdire l'accès du monastère aux profanes et activer les pièges. Il me paraît préférable qu'un magos ordonné vous apporte son aide. »

languages.text: “根据《操作与维护原理》，我的技术同胞应该会锁住修道院大门，不让教外人士进入，并启动陷阱。我认为，最合适的做法，应该是让一名获得认证的贤者提供援助。”
languages.original_text: "According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

traits.locale_text: “根据《操作与维护原理》，我的技术同胞应该会锁住修道院大门，不让教外人士进入，并启动陷阱。我认为，最合适的做法，应该是让一名获得认证的贤者参与实施这些对策。”

languages.text: 「任務の要理によると、我が技術の同志は修道院の門を閉ざし、一般人を締め出して罠を作動することになっている。宿命を背負ったマゴスが手助けをするのが最適と言えよう」
languages.original_text: "According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

traits.locale_text: 「任務の要理によると、我が技術の同志は修道院の門を閉ざし、一般人を締め出して罠を作動することになっている。宿命を背負ったマゴスがこの対策に携わることは最適と言えよう」

languages.text: «Según el Catecismo de Mantenimiento y Operación, mis tecnocamaradas debían cerrar las puertas del monasterio contra los laicos y activar las trampas. Considero óptimo que un magos consagrado nos ayude».
languages.original_text: "According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

traits.locale_text: «Según el Catecismo de Operación y Mantenimiento, mis tecnocamaradas debían cerrar las puertas del monasterio a los laicos y activar las trampas. Considero óptimo que un Magos consagrado nos ayude».

languages.text: "Bakım ve Faaliyet İlmihâli'ne göre, tekno yoldaşlarımın manastır kapılarını avama kapatıp tuzakları etkinleştirmesi gerekiyordu. Kanımca, yetkilendirilmiş bir Magos'un yardım etmesi ideal olur."
languages.original_text: "According to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation, my tech-comrades were supposed to lock the monastery gates against laypeople and activate the traps. I deem it optimal that an ordained Magos should provide his assistance."

traits.locale_text: "Bakım ve Faaliyet İlmihâli'ne göre, tekno yoldaşlarımın manastır kapılarını avama kapatıp tuzakları etkinleştirmesi gerekiyordu. Kanımca, yetkilendirilmiş bir Magos'un yardım etmesi ideal olur."
